Actions.Name: Jet Cloak
Actions.Description: Discard a valuables token, destroying it. Remove self from the battlefield. At the start of the next player turn, return adjacent to any player character. That character takes 2 damage twice and is dazed.

Actions.Name: Blinding Venom
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is blinded+. They can end this condition by picking up a valuables token, or ending a turn adjacent to an ally.
